creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: nude Adam in contrapposto stance next to tree, holding a fruit still attached to the tree; a lion rests behind Adam on the ground
marks:
Signature, Marks

in graphite on verso: B11I | 8 monogram in plate, along right edge: [AG]
provenance: Kupferstich-Kabinett, Staatliche Kunstsammlungen, Dresden; John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: Adam
